suppress.notes: Temporarily suppress CVE-2022-38752. Fix is available since snakeyaml-1.32 but database still reporting as false positive https://github.com/jeremylong/DependencyCheck/issues/4919 More info on the fix here https://bitbucket.org/snakeyaml/snakeyaml/issues/531/stackoverflow-oss-fuzz-47081
